snippet.title: Colors of Your World v2.01 Full Playthrough (Normal + Challenge Mode)
snippet.description:
Play "Colors of Your World" at https://cocoamoss.com/colors-of-your-world/colors-of-your-world.html
Colors of Your World is a 2D platformer reminiscent of Celeste where you must make sacrifices to gain abilities and progress.
Colors of Your World was created by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia, under the Cocoa Moss label.  It was originally developed in 72 hours for round 43 of the Ludum Dare game jam competition.  The theme was "Sacrifices must be made".
More info at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/colors-of-your-world
